## FloatMatrix.adjoint() method

Returns the adjoint of the matrix

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
adjoint(): Matrix<number>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[Matrix](./vector.matrix.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt;

The adjoint

## Remarks

The adjoint of a matrix A is the conjugate of the transpose of A
